Articles.Content:
I think it would be a little more convenient if we simply had a megathread for spacecraft sharing.

So everyone may now post rockets here. Please try to list the following information:

Delta-V of each stage

Stage Masses

Engine Cut off times

Rocket purpose.

Here, everyone can share creations and download quickly without scanning through thousands of new updates!
What exactly is the point of this when we have an entire subforum for this?
Already explained that. Sifting through hundreds of threads split into pages with obscure download links can be annoying. And you never know what you're getting.
But we have a subforum for this. It's frankly more annoying to sift through a thread than it is a forum.
